thread.section_title: Fishpond Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fishpond | www.fishpond.com.au
thread.title: Veronica Rose

author: Veronica Rose
title: Veronica Rose
text:
For years, my go-to online retailers were Amazon and eBay. Not anymore. The postage has become stupidly high on Amazon (US), and the delivery times for most items on eBay is now nearing 2 months or never arriving.
Not good enough.
Then I found Fishpond. No postage, stocking everything I've looked for so far, and a great email notification process for orders and wishlisted items.
My only niggle is how many items are shipped from either a US or UK fulfilment centre, delaying delivery; however, compared to eBay, and without the exorbitant cost of Amazon, I choose Fishpond every time.
